df-ordt
blocks.content: Define the order topology, given an order ` <_ ` , written as ` r ` below. A closed subbasis for the order topology is given by the closed rays ` [ y , +oo ) = { z e. X | y <_ z } ` and ` ( -oo , y ] = { z e. X | z <_ y } ` , along with ` ( -oo , +oo ) = X ` itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: df-xrs
blocks.content: The extended real number structure. Unlike ~ df-cnfld , the extended real numbers do not have good algebraic properties, so this is not actually a group or anything higher, even though it has just as many operations as ~ df-cnfld . The main interest in this structure is in its ordering, which is complete and compact. The metric described here is an extension of the absolute value metric, but it is not itself a metric because ` +oo ` is infinitely far from all other points. The topology is based on the order and not the extended metric (which would make ` +oo ` an isolated point since there is nothing else in the ` 1 ` -ball around it). All components of this structure agree with ` CCfld ` when restricted to ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: df-imas
blocks.content: Define an image structure, which takes a structure and a function on the base set, and maps all the operations via the function. For this to work properly ` f ` must either be injective or satisfy the well-definedness condition ` f ( a ) = f ( c ) /\ f ( b ) = f ( d ) -> ` ` f ( a + b ) = f ( c + d ) ` for each relevant operation. Note that although we call this an "image" by association to ~ df-ima , in order to keep the definition simple we consider only the case when the domain of ` F ` is equal to the base set of ` R ` . Other cases can be achieved by restricting ` F ` (with ~ df-res ) and/or ` R ` ( with ~ df-ress ) to their common domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: df-qus
blocks.content: Define a quotient ring (or quotient group), which is a special case of an image structure ~ df-imas where the image function is ` x |-> [ x ] e ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.content: The base set of an image structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.) (Revised by AV, 6-Oct-2020.)

thm imasbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, co(c2, cimas, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c4, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, co(c3, cimas, c6)))

blocks.name: imasmulr
blocks.content: The ring multiplication in an image structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)

thm imasmulr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, co(c2, cimas, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c1, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c7))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  strfv3(c0, ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))), c4, cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c6), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cplusg, c4)), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))))), ctp(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, c5)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), ciun(s1, c1, cmpo(s0, hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), csn(cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c5), cv(s1)))))), cop(cfv(cip, cnx), ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, c5), cv(s1))))))))), ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), co(cfv(ctopn, c5), cqtop, c2)), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(c2, cfv(cple, c5)), ccnv(c2))), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), cfv(cds, c4)))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat2)), cmulr, universe, w0)
  imasval(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, hs5, hs2, hs3, hs4, c4, c6, cfv(cplusg, c4), ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))), cfv(csca, c5), ciun(s1, c1, cmpo(s0, hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), csn(cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c5), cv(s1))))), ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, c5), cv(s1)))))), co(cfv(ctopn, c5), cqtop, c2), ccom(ccom(c2, cfv(cple, c5)), ccnv(c2)), cfv(cds, c4), c2, c5, c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), cfv(cvsca, c5), cfv(cip, c5), cfv(ctopn, c5), cfv(cds, c5), cfv(cple, c5), c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)))
  eqid(cfv(cvsca, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cip, c5))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cple, c5))
  imasplusg(s0, s1, cfv(cplusg, c4), c1, c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  eqidd(ciun(s0, c1, ciun(s1, c1, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))), w0)
  eqidd(ciun(s1, c1, cmpo(s0, hs0, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c5)), csn(cfv(c2, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), cfv(cvsca, c5), cv(s1))))), w0)

blocks.content: The scalar multiplication operation of an image structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)

thm imasvsca(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

thm imasle(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, ccom(ccom(c1, c2), ccnv(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, co(c1, cimas, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c1, c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cple, c3))
} = {
  strfv3(c0, ccom(ccom(c1, c2), ccnv(c1)), c3, cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c6), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), cfv(cplusg, c3)), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cfv(cmulr, c3))), ctp(cop(cfv(csca, cnx), cfv(csca, c4)), cop(cfv(cvsca, cnx), cfv(cvsca, c3)), cop(cfv(cip, cnx), ciun(hs0, c5, ciun(hs1, c5, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c4), cv(hs1))))))))), ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cts, c3)), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), ccom(ccom(c1, c2), ccnv(c1))), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), cfv(cds, c3)))), cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat2)), cple, universe, w0)
  imasval(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs7, hs4, hs5, hs6, c3, c6, cfv(cplusg, c3), cfv(cmulr, c3), cfv(csca, c4), cfv(cvsca, c3), ciun(hs0, c5, ciun(hs1, c5, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cip, c4), cv(hs1)))))), cfv(cts, c3), ccom(ccom(c1, c2), ccnv(c1)), cfv(cds, c3), c1, c4, c5, cfv(cplusg, c4), cfv(cmulr, c4), cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), cfv(cvsca, c4), cfv(cip, c4), cfv(ctopn, c4), cfv(cds, c4), c2, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cip, c4))
  imasplusg(hs0, hs1, cfv(cplusg, c3), c5, c1, cfv(cplusg, c4), c3, c4, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c3))
  imasmulr(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmulr, c3), c5, c1, cfv(cmulr, c4), c3, c4, c6, c7, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c3))
  imasvsca(hs1, hs0, hs2, cfv(cvsca, c3), c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)), c1, cfv(cvsca, c4), c3, c4, c6, c7, cfv(csca, c4), w0)
  eqid(cfv(csca, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, c4)))

} = {
  anbi12d(w3a(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wceq(cfv(c5, c0), cfv(c5, c3)), wceq(cfv(c5, c2), cfv(c5, c4)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4))

  simp3l(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1))

blocks.name: imasaddvallem
blocks.content: The operation of an image structure is defined to distribute over the mapping function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: imasaddflem
blocks.content: The image set operations are closed if the original operation is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imasaddflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c3, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3))), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s3)))), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, ciun(s2, c3, ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3))), wcel(co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)), c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)

  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wss(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1)))
  imasaddfnlem(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqsstrd(c0, cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1), ciun(s2, c3, ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciun(s2, c3, ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1)), wral(s2, c3, wss(ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1))))
  ralrimiva(s2, c3, w0, wss(ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c3)), wss(ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1)), wral(s3, c3, wss(csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1))))
  ralrimiva(s3, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c3)), wss(csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1)))

  opelxpd(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))), cxp(c1, c1), c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3))))
  sylan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3)), wcel(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cxp(c1, c1)), wf(c2, c3, c1))

  ffvelrn(c2, c3, c1, cv(s2))
  ffvelrn(c2, c3, c1, cv(s3))
  opelxpi(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(s3)), c1)
  syl2an2r(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))), c1), wf(c2, c3, c1), wcel(co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)), c3))
  syl(w0, wf(c2, c3, c1), wfo(c2, c3, c1))
  fof(c2, c3, c1)
  ffvelrn(c2, c3, c1, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))
  iunss(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  iunss(s2, c3, ciun(s3, c3, csn(cop(cop(cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3)))))), cxp(cxp(c1, c1), c1))
  dff2(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c1)
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, wcel(cv(s2), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, cv(s2), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cxp.s(s3, cxp(c1, c1), c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s3, c1, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, cxp(c1, c1), c1)

thm imasaddflem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c3)‚àß(s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(((c2 ` s0)=(c2 ` s2)‚àß(c2 ` s1)=(c2 ` s3))‚Üí(c2 `(s0[c4]s1))=(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> })))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c3))‚Üí(s2[c4]s3)‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 :(c1 √ó c1)‚Üí c1), c0[Fn](c1 √ó c1), c0 ‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1))
  imasaddfnlem(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  eqsstrd(c0, ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1), ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> })), w0)
  sylibr(w0, ‚ãÉ(s2 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> }))‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c3, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> })‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1)))
  ralrimiva(s2, c3, w0, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> })‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1))
  sylibr((w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c3), ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> })‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> } ‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1)))
  ralrimiva(s3, c3, (w0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c3), { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> } ‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1))
  anassrs(w0, s2 ‚àà c3, s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> } ‚äÜ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1))
  snssd(< <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))>, ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1), (w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c3)))
  opelxpd(<(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>, (c2 `(s2[c4]s3)), (c1 √ó c1), c1, (w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c3)))
  sylan(w0, (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s3 ‚àà c3), <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)> ‚àà(c1 √ó c1), (c2 : c3 ‚Üí c1))

  fof(c2, c3, c1)

  iunss(s2, c3, ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà c3, { < <(c2 ` s2),(c2 ` s3)>,(c2 `(s2[c4]s3))> }), ((c1 √ó c1)√ó c1))
  dff2(c0, (c1 √ó c1), c1)
  diff.wa.s(s3, w0, s2 ‚àà c3)

blocks.name: imasaddfn
blocks.content: The image structure's group operation is a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm imasaddfn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c3, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c3))), wi(wa(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s3)))), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), cfv(c2, co(cv(s2), c4, cv(s3))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, co(c2, cimas, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  imasaddfnlem(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  imasplusg(s2, s3, c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6, c1, c7, w0)
}

blocks.name: imasvscaf
blocks.content: The image structure's scalar multiplication is closed in the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)

thm qusval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cimas, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, cqus, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, c4, cec(cv(s0), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, cimas, c2))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  eqtrd(c0, co(c1, cimas, c2), co(c2, cqus, c3), w0)
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c2, cqus, c3, co(c1, cimas, c2), universe, universe, co(cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), cimas, cv(hs0)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cqus, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, co(cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), cimas, cv(hs0)))))
  df-qus(hs0, hs1, s0)
  oveq12d(cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), cimas, cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  syl6eqr(cmpt(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1))), c1, cmpt(s0, c4, cec(cv(s0), c3)), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), c4, cec(cv(s0), c3), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  fveq2d(cbs, cv(hs0), c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)), wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c2)))
  ad2antll(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wceq(cec(cv(s0), cv(hs1)), cec(cv(s0), c3)))
  eceq2(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  elexd(c2, c6, w0)
  elexd(c3, c5, w0)
  ovexd(c1, cimas, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cimas, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, cimas, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1["s]c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c2[/s]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 =(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(s0 ‚àà c4 ‚Ü¶[s0]c3)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí c0 =(c1["s]c2)), d(s0, c4))

thm quslem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

thm xpsc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1))), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c1o), csn(c1))))
} = {
  3eqtri(ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1))), cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c1o), csn(c1))), ccnv(cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o)))), cun(ccnv(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls))), ccnv(cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o)))))
  cnveqi(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)), cun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o)))), wcel(csn(c0), universe), wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  snex(c0)
  snex(c1)
  cdaval(csn(c0), universe, csn(c1), universe)
  cnvun(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls)), cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o)))
  uneq12i(ccnv(cxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls))), ccnv(cxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o))), cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c1o), csn(c1)))
  cnvxp(csn(c0), csn(emptycls))
  cnvxp(csn(c1), csn(c1o))
}

thm xpscg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c2))), cpr(cop(emptycls, c0), cop(c1o, c2))))

  syl2an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(cun(cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), cxp(csn(c1o), csn(c2))), cun(csn(cop(emptycls, c0)), csn(cop(c1o, c2)))), wceq(cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), csn(cop(emptycls, c0))), wceq(cxp(csn(c1o), csn(c2)), csn(cop(c1o, c2))))
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(csn(emptycls), csn(c0)), csn(cop(emptycls, c0))), wcel(emptycls, universe))

blocks.name: xpssca
blocks.content: Value of the scalar field of a binary structure product. For concreteness, we choose the scalar field to match the left argument, but in most cases where this slot is meaningful both factors will have the same scalar field, so that it doesn't matter which factor is chosen. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpssca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cxps, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(csca, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
} = {
  imassca(c0, c1, ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), co(c0, cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c2), ccda, csn(c3)))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3)), universe, w0)
  xpsval(hs0, hs1, c1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(c0, cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c2), ccda, csn(c3)))), c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), c4, c5, c0, w0)
  xpslem(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(c0, cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c2), ccda, csn(c3)))), c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), c4, c5, c0, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  syl(w0, wfo(ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3))), wf1o(ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3))))
  mp1i(w0, wf1o(ccnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3))), wf1o(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))))))

  f1ocnv(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), cxp(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3)), crn(cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c3), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1)))))))

thm xpssca(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 =(Scalar ` c1))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c2[√ó]c3)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  imassca(c0, c1, `'(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), (c0[√ó]`'({ c2 }[+]{ c3 })), ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 }))), ((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3)), universe, w0)
  xpsval(hs0, hs1, c1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), (c0[√ó]`'({ c2 }[+]{ c3 })), c2, c3, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c3), c4, c5, c0, w0)
  xpslem(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), (c0[√ó]`'({ c2 }[+]{ c3 })), c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c2), (Base ` c3), c4, c5, c0, w0)
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c3))
  syl(w0, (`'(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })): ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))‚Ü†((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3))), (`'(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })): ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))‚Üî((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3))))
  mp1i(w0, (`'(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })): ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))‚Üî((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3))), ((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })):((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3))‚Üî ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))))
  xpsff1o2(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), (Base ` c2), (Base ` c3))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })))
  f1ocnv((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 })), ((Base ` c2)√ó(Base ` c3)), ran((hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c2), hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c3)‚Ü¶ `'({ hs0 }[+]{ hs1 }))))
